DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , randomize , double-blind , cross-over study compare pharmacodynamic response subject Acute Coronary Syndrome receive 10-mg maintenance dose ( MD ) prasugrel compare 150-mg maintenance dose clopidogrel , follow 900-mg load dose ( LD ) clopidogrel .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Blood Cells , Known Platelets , Using Prasugrel v Clopidogrel Patients With Heart Problem Acute Coronary Syndrome ( ACS )
DOC.criteria: Present acute coronary syndrome ( ACS ) plan treatment onetime 900mg load dose commercially available clopidogrel ( administer single cumulative dose ) . Are age 18 85 year . Willing able sign inform consent . Have overt STsegment elevation myocardial infarction ( STEMI ) . Have cardiogenic shock . Have refractory ventricular arrhythmia . Have New York Heart Association ( NYHA ) Class IV congestive heart failure . Have severe uncontrolled hypertension . Have active internal bleeding history bleed diathesis . Have increase risk bleeding . Have history cerebrovascular accident . Have certain abnormal blood level value . Are currently receive chemotherapy radiation therapy .
